title.rendered: Real Assets reports: Alvarium to raise £250m in London IPO for homeless housing REIT

excerpt.rendered: Alvarium Home REIT Advisors plans to raise £250m via shares on the London Stock Exchange by floating a new UK homeless housing real estate investment trust (REIT).
